name: Borges' Secret Miracle
description:
Though sentenced to death, you've been granted one 'year' to complete your life's work. See what you can get done before time runs out - the only objective is the objective you set for yourself.

Click on the text box and start typing to begin.

For context, check out the short story by Jorge Luis Borges: The Secret Miracle. It's free to read online via Project Gutenberg.
